mdRecord.dcterms:title: Reports of cases argued and determined in the High Court of Chancery: in the time of Lord Chancellor Hardwicke [1736-1754] / collected and methodised by John Tracy Atkyns .. ; with notes and references, and three tables : one of the several titles with their divisions, another of the names of the cases, and a third of the principal matters
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Atkyns, John Tracy, approximately 1710-1773
Great Britain. Court of Chancery.
Hardwicke, Philip Yorke Earl of, 1690-1764
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by the King's law-printers, and sold by Messrs. Payne [etc.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cases in v. 1 are arranged alphabetically by subject; those in v. 2-3, chronologically.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Great Britain
Equity--Great Britain--Cases
